description: This rule detect common flag combinations used by CrackMapExec in order to detect its use even if the binary has been replaced.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - CrackMapExec Execution
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\crackmapexec.exe") OR (process.command_line.text:"*\ \-M\ pe_inject\ *") OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-\-local\-auth*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-u\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-x\ *")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-\-local\-auth*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-u\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-p\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-H\ 'NTHASH'*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ mssql\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-u\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-p\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-M\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-d\ *")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ smb\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-u\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-H\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-M\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-o\ *")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ smb\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-u\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-p\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-\-local\-auth*")))) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-\-local\-auth*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-u\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-p\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ 10.*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ 192.168.*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\/24\ *")))
